issue.title: [C++/Python] hdfs: encryption-at-rest and secure transport
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1322](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1322). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
HDFS provides for encrypted data transfer and encryption of data on-disc (e.g., via KMS records). It would be nice to see these available within arrow-hdfs.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1322?focusedCommentId=17392864) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
